## Fake data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

d <- tibble(
  date = seq(
    as_date("1998-01-01"), 
    as_date("2018-01-01"), by = "years"),
  index = runif(21, 0, 100))

DT::datatable(d)
```

## Time series plot

- [dygraphs for R](https://rstudio.github.io/dygraphs/)

```{r}
library(dygraphs)
library(xts)

as.xts(d$index, order.by=d$date) %>% 
  dygraph() %>%
  dyRangeSelector()
```
